name: acchio
description: A lightweight HTTP client for making requests in both browser and Node.js environments, inspired by Axios.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:types
scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch && npm publish && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && npm publish && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && npm publish && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && npm publish && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:alpha: standard-version --prerelease alpha && npm publish --tag alpha && git push origin main --follow-tags
scripts.release:beta: standard-version --prerelease beta && npm publish --tag beta && git push origin main --follow-tags

author: Fernando Soares
